<TYPE>EX-2.2
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>a05-1796_1ex2d2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-2.2
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;2.2</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="FirstAmendmentToAgreementAndPlanO_101515"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST AMENDMENT TO AGREEMENT AND PLAN OF MERGER</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>AMENDMENT
dated as of December&nbsp;23, 2004, to the Agreement and Plan of Merger (the &#147;Agreement&#148;)
dated as of November&nbsp;3, 2004,<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>among Argosy
Gaming Company, a Delaware corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), Penn National Gaming,&nbsp;Inc.,
a Pennsylvania corporation (&#147;Parent&#148;) and Thoroughbred Acquisition Corp., a
Delaware corporation and a wholly owned subsidiary of Parent (collectively with
the Company and Parent, the &#147;Parties&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="Witnesseth_101520"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">WITNESSETH:</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Parties, pursuant to Section&nbsp;8.7 of
the Agreement, desire to amend the Agreement to reflect the changes set forth
herein;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, for good and valuable consideration,
the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Parties
hereby agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Capitalization.</font></i>&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;Section&nbsp;3.2(a)&nbsp;of
the Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the reference to &#147;1,324,549&#148;
therein and inserting &#147;1,339,549&#148; in lieu thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;The &#147;Option Schedule&#148; included in Section&nbsp;3.2
of the Company Disclosure Schedule is hereby deleted and replaced in its
entirety with the &#147;Option Schedule&#148; attached hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Employee Matters.&nbsp;&nbsp; </font></i>Section&nbsp;6.9(f)&nbsp;of
the Agreement is hereby amended and restated to read in its entirety as
follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(f)&nbsp;Parent and the Surviving Corporation will
cause to be paid to any individual who is an employee of the Company as of the
Effective Time, to the extent not previously paid, (i)&nbsp;such individual&#146;s
full bonus under the Company&#146;s Management Bonus Plan for the preceding fiscal
year (such bonus to be paid as promptly as practicable following the Effective
Time) and (ii)&nbsp;a pro rata portion (as of the Effective Time) of such
individual&#146;s bonus under the Company&#146;s Management Bonus Plan for such fiscal
year in which the Closing occurs (such pro rata bonus to be paid as promptly as
possible following the Effective Time).&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Termination Amount.&nbsp;&nbsp; </font></i>Section&nbsp;8.6(b)&nbsp;of
the Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the reference to &#147;$49,500,000&#148;
therein and inserting &#147;$41,500,000&#148; in lieu thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Effect of Amendment.&nbsp;&nbsp; </font></i>This
First Amendment shall not constitute an amendment or modification of any
provision of, or schedule to, the Agreement not expressly referred to herein.
Except as expressly amended or modified herein, the provisions and schedules of
the Agreement are and shall remain in full force and effect.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Governing Law.</font></i>&nbsp;&nbsp; This
First Amendment and the legal relations among the parties hereto shall be
governed by, and construed and enforced in accordance with, the Laws of the
State of Delaware, without regard to its conflict of laws rules.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.<i><font style="font-style:italic;"> References.</font></i>&nbsp;&nbsp; Capitalized
terms used herein and not otherwise defined shall have the meanings assigned to
such terms in the Agreement. Each reference to &#147;hereof&#146;, &#147;hereunder&#148;, &#147;herein&#148;
and &#147;hereby&#148; and each other similar reference and each reference to &#147;this
Agreement&#148; and each other similar reference contained in the Agreement shall
refer to the Agreement as amended hereby.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Counterparts.</font></i>&nbsp;&nbsp; This
First Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, all of which shall
be considered one and the same agreement and shall become effective when one or
more counterparts have been signed by each of the parties and delivered to the
other parties.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\drao\05-1796-1\task340602\1796-1-kc.htm',USER='drmschandra',CD='Mar 10 09:13 2005' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this First Amendment as of
the day and year first above written.</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.10
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>a05-1796_1ex10d10.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.10
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.10</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="AmendmentNumberOneToEmploymentAgr_101501"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">AMENDMENT NUMBER ONE TO EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Amendment Number One to Employment Agreement (the
&#147;Agreement&#148;) is made and entered into this 24<sup>th</sup> day of September&nbsp;2004
(this &#147;Amendment&#148;) by and between Argosy Gaming Company, a Delaware corporation
(the &#147;Company&#148;) and James A. Gulbrandsen, an individual residing in the State
of Missouri (the &#147;Employee&#148;):</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECITALS:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Compensation Committee of the Company&#146;s
Board of Directors believes it is in the best interest of the Company to enter
into this Amendment Number One to Employment Agreement with the Employee; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Company and Employee are parties to an
Employment Agreement, the term of which the parties have agreed will expire on December&nbsp;31,
2004 (the &#147;Agreement&#148;);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and of
the covenants and agreements herein contained, the parties hereto agree that
the Agreement is hereby amended as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following sentence shall be added to the end of Section&nbsp;2
of the Agreement: &#147;The term of this Agreement is hereby extended for the period
from January&nbsp;1, 2005, through December&nbsp;31, 2005, unless terminated as
hereinafter provided in Sections 5 and 6 hereof.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Base Salary in Section&nbsp;3(a)&nbsp;shall be
$175,000 for the period from January&nbsp;1, 2005, through December&nbsp;31,
2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, this Amendment Number One to Employment Agreement has been
executed by the Company, by a duly authorized officer, and by the Employee as
of the date first above written.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><a name="Exhibit10_18_102346"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.17</font></b></a></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="KeyEmployee2004LongTermIncentiveC_102346"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">KEY EMPLOYEE<br>&#160;2004 LONG TERM INCENTIVE CASH AWARD</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The 2004 Long Term
Incentive (&#147;LTI&#148;) Cash Award provides key employees with a financial incentive
to maximize shareholder value. The value of your award, like the stock held by
our shareholders, increases through stock price appreciation.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><a name="EligibleParticipants_102346"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All Officers, General
Managers and Director level employees of the Company who received a stock
option award on April&nbsp;29, 2004.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><a name="Award_102346"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">AWARD</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On April&nbsp;29, 2004, each participant has been
granted a LTI Cash Award. The LTI Cash Award is in addition to the stock
options granted on this date. Similar to a stock option the award is not
immediately available to you. The award will vest and be payable at the end of
three years. No payment will be made before the final vesting date. The award
payment will be indexed to the movement of Argosy Gaming Company stock at the
end of this period. The LTI Cash Award will be multiplied by the index to
calculate the actual award payment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The index calculation is:&#160; The stock closing price on the date the award
vests divided by the stock closing price the date of the award, April&nbsp;29,
2004. The LTI Cash Award amount will be multiplied by the index to calculate
the actual award payment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Argosy Gaming Company stock closed on April&nbsp;29,
2004 at $37.71.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Examples:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>On April&nbsp;30,
2007 Argosy Gaming Company stock closes at $45.00. An executive granted a
$30,000 LTI Cash Award on April&nbsp;29, 2004 would receive a LTI Cash payment
of&#160; $35,800. ($30,000 X 119% =
$35,800&#160; $45.00 divided by $37.71 =
119%).</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>On
April&nbsp;30, 2007 Argosy Gaming Company stock closes at $30.00. An executive
granted a $30,000 LTI Cash Award on April&nbsp;29, 2004 would receive a LTI
Cash payment of&#160; $24,000. ($30,000 X 80%
= $24,000&#160; $30.00 divided by $37.71 =
80%).</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><a name="Vesting_102346"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">VESTING</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">LTI Cash Award becomes
vested on April&nbsp;30, 2007, the 3<sup>rd</sup> year anniversary of the
award.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><a name="Payment_102346"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PAYMENT</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The LTI Award will be paid in cash and will be payable
as soon as reasonably possible following the vesting date. The payment is
considered bonus compensation and will be subject to income tax and other
deductions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the case of death,
permanent disability or change of control, a pro-rata share of the LTI Award
will be made based on the date of the event. The pro-rata share will be
determined by calculating the total number of days from April&nbsp;29, 2004, to
the date of the event divided by 1095 multiplied by the LTI Cash Award amount. The
pro-rata LTI Cash Award will be multiplied by the index on the date of the
event to calculate the actual award payment. In the case of termination of
employment for reasons other than the above prior to the vesting date, the full
LTI Cash Award will be forfeited.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\dsrinivasan\05-1796-1\task340240\1796-1-kg.htm',USER='dsrinivasan',CD='Mar 10 06:33 2005' -->

of Awards to Executive Officers</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During
2004, subject to the provisions of the LTI Plan, awards were made to executive
officers as follows:</font></p>

  <td width="431" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:323.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Arnold L. Block</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="52" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:39.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">240,480</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr height="0">
  <td width="81" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="343" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="16" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="45" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="2" style="border:none;"></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 11.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The above awards are subject to adjustment under the
terms of the LTI plan. In the case of death, permanent disability or change of
control, a pro-rata share of the LTI Award will be made based on the date of
the event. The pro-rata share will be determined by calculating the total
number of days from April&nbsp;29, 2004 to the date of the event divided by
1,095 multiplied by the LTI Cash Award amount. The pro-rata LTI Cash Award will
be multiplied by the index on the date of the event to calculate the actual
award payment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;23</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="ConsentOfIndependentRegisteredAcc_113107"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING
FIRM</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We consent to the incorporation by reference in the
Registration Statement (Form&nbsp;S-3 No.&nbsp;333-62664) of Argosy
Gaming Company and in the Registration Statement (Form&nbsp;S-8 No.&nbsp;33-76418)
pertaining to the Stock Option Plan and Director Option Plan of Argosy Gaming
Company of our reports dated March&nbsp;14, 2005, with respect to the
consolidated financial statements and schedule of Argosy Gaming Company, Argosy
Gaming Company management&#146;s assessment of the effectiveness of internal control
over financial reporting, and the effectiveness of internal control over
financial reporting of Argosy Gaming Company, included in this Annual Report
(Form 10-K) for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2004.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ERNST &amp; YOUNG LLP</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Chicago, Illinois<br>
March&nbsp;14, 2005</font></p>

</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<TYPE>EX-24
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>a05-1796_1ex24.htm

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;24</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="PowerOfAttorney_063713"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">POWER OF ATTORNEY</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">KNOW
ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENT, that the undersigned Director of Argosy Gaming
Company, a Delaware corporation, which is about to file with the Securities and
Exchange Commission under the provisions of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934
its Annual Report Form&nbsp;10-K for its fiscal year ended December&nbsp;31,
2004, hereby constitutes and appoints Richard J. Glasier and Dale R. Black, and
each of them, his true and lawful attorneys-in-fact and agents, with full power
to act without the other, to sign such Annual Report and to file such Annual
Report and the exhibits thereto and any and all other documents and amendments
in connection therewith with the Securities and Exchange Commission and any
national exchange or self regulatory agency and to do and perform any and all
acts and things requisite and necessary to be done in connection with the
foregoing as fully as he might or could do in person hereby ratifying and
confirming all that said attorneys-in-fact and agents, or either of them, may
lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:50.0%;">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>8
<FILENAME>a05-1796_1ex31d1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-31.1
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;31.1</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="CertificationPursuantToSection302_102633"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION
PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I, Richard J.
Glasier, President and Chief Executive Officer, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>I have reviewed
this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Argosy Gaming Company (the &#147;Report&#148;);</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, this Report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this Report;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this Report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this Report;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The registrant&#146;s
other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f)) for the
registrant and have:</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>designed such
disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly
during the period in which this Report is being prepared;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>designed such
internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over
financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable
assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of
financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this Report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
Report based on such evaluation; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>disclosed in this
Report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting
that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the
registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the
registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The registrant&#146;s
other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent
evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s
auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or
persons performing the equivalent function):</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 40.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting.</p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;">Date: March 15, 2005</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.06%;">
  <p style="margin:12.0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.3%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:12.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/
  RICHARD J. GLASIER</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:43.64%;">
  <p style="margin:12.0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.3%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Richard J.
  Glasier</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:43.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.3%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">President
  and Chief Executive Officer</font></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:43.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

<TYPE>EX-31.2
<SEQUENCE>9
<FILENAME>a05-1796_1ex31d2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-31.2
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="#000000" vlink="purple">

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;31.2</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="CertificationPursuantToSection302_103756"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION
PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I, Dale R. Black, Senior Vice President and Chief
Financial Officer, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>I have reviewed
this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Argosy Gaming Company (the &#147;Report&#148;);</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, this Report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this Report;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this Report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this Report;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The registrant&#146;s
other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f)) for the
registrant and have:</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>designed such
disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly
during the period in which this Report is being prepared;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>designed such
internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over
financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable
assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation
of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this Report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>disclosed in this
Report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting
that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the
registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the
registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The registrant&#146;s
other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent
evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s
auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or
persons performing the equivalent function):</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 40.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting.</p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">

  </td>

  DALE R. BLACK</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="42%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:42.12%;">

  </td>

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;32.1</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="CertificationPursuantTo18U_s_c_Se_102834"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION
PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<br>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the Annual Report of Argosy Gaming Company (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form&nbsp;10-K
for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2004 as filed with the Securities and
Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Richard J. Glasier,
President and Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18
U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)&#160;&#160; The Report
fully complies with the requirements of section 13(a)&nbsp;or 15(d)&nbsp;of the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 24.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)&#160;&#160; The information contained in the Report
fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results
of operations of the Company.</font></p>

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;32.2</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><a name="CertificationPursuantTo18U_s_c_Se_103118"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION
PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,</font></b></a><a name="AsAdoptedPursuantToSection906OfTh_103118"><br>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</a></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the Annual Report of Argosy Gaming Company (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form&nbsp;10-K
for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2004 as filed with the Securities and
Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Dale R. Black, Senior
Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to
18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)&nbsp;&nbsp; The Report fully complies with the
requirements of section 13(a)&nbsp;or 15(d)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act
of 1934; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 24.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)&nbsp;&nbsp; The information
contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial
condition and results of operations of the Company.</font></p>
